
DELETE FROM "BookCategories" where book_id in (384,526,508,812,763,727,459,77,729,332,507,340,65,728,313,454,127,811,767,132,395,761,715,481,338,92,199,510);
DELETE FROM "AuthorBooks" where book_id in (384,526,508,812,763,727,459,77,729,332,507,340,65,728,313,454,127,811,767,132,395,761,715,481,338,92,199,510);
DELETE FROM "Reviews" where book_id in (384,526,508,812,763,727,459,77,729,332,507,340,65,728,313,454,127,811,767,132,395,761,715,481,338,92,199,510);
DELETE FROM "Books" where book_id in (384,526,508,812,763,727,459,77,729,332,507,340,65,728,313,454,127,811,767,132,395,761,715,481,338,92,199,510)
